Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our clothing manufacturing services, MOQ, pricing, lead times, and more.

What is your minimum order quantity (MOQ)?

Our MOQ is 50 pieces per style per color. Size splits are allowed across 5 sizes. For example, you can order 10 Small + 20 Medium + 12 Large + 8 XL = 50 units total.

What is the lead time for production?

Bulk orders: 15-20 days after sample approval. Samples: 7-10 days. Rush orders available for urgent requirements with additional charges. Timeline starts after payment confirmation and final approval.

Do you provide samples before bulk production?

Yes, we always provide samples before bulk production. Sample cost is $30-50 per piece depending on complexity. Sample fee is refundable with bulk orders. We allow up to 3 revisions to ensure your complete satisfaction.

What certifications do you have?

We are certified with OEKO-TEX Standard 100 (textile safety), BSCI (ethical workplace), and WRAP (responsible production). All our products meet USA and EU safety standards. Certificate numbers available upon request.

What are your payment terms?

Standard terms: 30% deposit to start production, 70% balance before shipping. We accept bank transfer (T/T), PayPal (for samples), and Western Union. LC (Letter of Credit) available for large orders.

Can you match my custom colors (PMS/Pantone)?

Yes, we can match Pantone colors for fabric dyeing. Please provide PMS/Pantone reference codes. Lab dip samples provided for color approval before bulk production. Some colors may require higher MOQ.

What printing and embroidery options do you offer?

Printing: Screen printing (up to 12 colors), heat transfer, sublimation, discharge printing. Embroidery: Flat embroidery, 3D puff, appliqué. We handle logo placement on chest, back, sleeve, or custom positions.

Do you provide tech pack and pattern making services?

Yes, our design team can create tech packs and patterns based on your sketches or reference images. Service fee: $50-150 depending on complexity. Free for bulk orders over 500 pieces.

What fabrics do you work with?

100% cotton (combed, carded, organic), cotton-polyester blends (65/35, 50/50), tri-blend, French terry, fleece, jersey knit, pique, performance fabrics. Fabric weight: 160-320 GSM depending on product type.

How much does custom clothing manufacturing cost?

T-shirts: $3-6/piece, Hoodies: $12-18/piece, Activewear: $8-15/piece. Final pricing depends on fabric, quantity, customization, and specifications. Contact us for exact quote based on your requirements.

Can you ship to USA/UK/Europe?

Yes, we ship worldwide. Main markets: USA, UK, Germany, Canada, Australia. Shipping: FOB Chittagong port (Bangladesh). We coordinate sea freight and air freight. Express shipping available for samples.

Do you handle customs and import documentation?

We provide all export documentation: commercial invoice, packing list, certificate of origin, inspection certificates. Import customs clearance is buyer's responsibility. We can recommend freight forwarders who handle door-to-door delivery.

What is your quality control process?

Three-stage QC: (1) Pre-production inspection of fabrics and trims, (2) Inline inspection during production (AQL 2.5 standard), (3) Final audit before packing. Third-party inspection welcome (SGS, BV, ITS).

Can you add custom labels and tags to my products?

Yes, complete private label service available. Custom woven labels, printed neck tags, care instruction labels, barcode labels, size stickers. We also offer branded packaging: poly bags, boxes, hangtags.

Do you work with fashion startups and small businesses?

Absolutely! Our low MOQ of 50 pieces is perfect for startups, DTC brands, Amazon FBA sellers, Shopify stores, and boutiques. We've helped hundreds of new brands launch their clothing lines.

Can I visit your factory?

Yes, factory visits welcome! Schedule appointment in advance. Location: Uttara, Dhaka, Bangladesh. We can arrange airport pickup. Virtual factory tours available via video call for international clients.

Still Have Questions?

Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact our team for personalized assistance.
